modName: Slick Silk Body - CBBE UUNP Bodyslide Preset
summary: A bodyslide preset with a wide range of curves.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][size=4][font=Trebuchet MS]I've created this bodyslide preset because I could never find one that I liked. This bodyslide preset aims to have a wide range of bust and butt sizes on your female characters, without making them look completely ridiculous.
It gives you a lot of variety without having to replace your body type everytime you want to change your character's proportions.[/font]
[/size]
[font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3] [font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide and Outfit Studio[/url]
CBBE [/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]or UUNP
I also recommend using HDT physics for optimal results.[/size][/font][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]
[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]
Hope you enjoy :)[/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS]
[/font][/center]
author: CollataralDamage
